title: LF Duo partner
body:
Yo, I'm 19 years old.
Currently silver 2.  

I am quite calm, I have a really mellow personality and I do not like raging or negativity in communication. I am really open to constructive criticism as I see LoL skill as a craft and I enjoy developing my abilities. If you can laugh about the misplays and opening admit to fucking up then we'll get along well.

I'm just after someone a similar age, who is fun and can laugh about shit. It would be great for someone of a high skill level to touch me up in some areas. I'm quite consistent but need to work on some key areas of the game. 

Skype: jordan.whore
IGN: Manawa

replies.body: ill touch you up in some areas {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Oh he's a elo digger
he takes your elo
#skype laste name WHORE digging ur self quite the hole there buddy
